name: BoulderBikeTrails
0:
”Alexa, ask Boulder Bike Trails if there are any trail closures.”
”Alexa, ask Boulder Bike Trails for the status of Centennial Cone.”
”Alexa, ask Boulder Bike Trails for the status of the Colorado Trail.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boulder bike trails
des: Get mountain biking trail closures and restrictions for Boulder, Colorado and the surrounding area. Includes Apex Park, Betasso Preserve, Centennial Cone, the Buffalo Creek area, sections of the Colorado Trail between Denver and Breckenridge, and many more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
